source.f363c0c3:
def remove_outlier(col):
    sorted(col)
    Q1,Q3 = col.quantile([0.25, 0.75])
    IQR = Q3 - Q1
    lower_range = Q1 - (1.5 * IQR)
    upper_range = Q3 + (1.5 * IQR)
    return lower_range, upper_range
source.13a715a9:
lowerprice, upperprice = remove_outlier(data["Price_in_thousands"])
data["Price_in_thousands"] = np.where(data["Price_in_thousands"]>upperprice, upperprice, data["Price_in_thousands"])
data["Price_in_thousands"] = np.where(data["Price_in_thousands"]<lowerprice, lowerprice, data["Price_in_thousands"])
